Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: People are taking to social media to express their opinions on the upcoming Australian Federal budget. Some are calling for increased support for young people facing homelessness while others are demanding full funding for infrastructure projects such as the Rockhampton Ring Road. A committee investigating the jobseeker rate has also called for a "substantial" increase with some criticizing Labor for not committing to the project in the past. Meanwhile healthcare professionals are calling for changes to make health cover more affordable and some are expressing disappointment at Labor's decision not to increase jobseeker payments. Tough economic times are anticipated to continue but the sentiment on social media is mixed.
